title: Eventful Britain [colour]
creator_contributor_role: British Travel and Holidays Association, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Description and travel
description: Sets out to show that there is always something on in Britain. Ranges over a calendar of events, crowded with ceremonies and sporting fixtures which are open to all and cost little or nothing to attend. Includes such events as the Brighton Veteran Car Run, the Farnborough Air Show, the Henley Royal Regatta, the FA Cup Final at Wembley and much more.
